remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction.  A version of ~ ovmpt2g using bound-variable hypotheses.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
ov2gf.a $e |- F/_ x A $.
ov2gf.c $e |- F/_ y A $.
ov2gf.d $e |- F/_ y B $.
ov2gf.1 $e |- F/_ x G $.
ov2gf.2 $e |- F/_ y S $.
ov2gf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> R = G ) $.
ov2gf.4 $e |- ( y = B -> G = S ) $.
ov2gf.5 $e |- F = ( x e. C , y e. D |-> R ) $.
ov2gf $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D /\ S e. H ) -> ( A F B ) = S ) $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
